data.title: Short Stories
data.meta_description:
Short Story - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides information on the history and defining characteristics of the short story genre. It discusses:

- The origins of short stories in oral storytelling traditions from ancient epics and fables. 

- The emergence of the modern short story form in the 17th century from earlier oral traditions and works like Chaucer's Canterbury Tales. 

- Key developments in the 18th-19th centuries with authors in various countries experimenting with and popularizing the short story form. 

- Characteristics of short stories like their brevity, focus on a single incident/setting, and inclusion of plot elements like exposition, complication, climax and resolution.
